MeasurementToolMetadata.Instructions: Stressful or scary events happen to many people. Below is a list of stressful and scary events that sometimes happen. Select YES if it happened to you. Select NO if it didn't happen to you.

cats_01.Description: Serious natural disaster like a flood, tornado, hurricane, earthquake, or fire.

cats_02.Description: Serious accident or injury like a car/bike crash, dog bite, sports injury.

cats_03.Description: Robbed by threat, force or weapon.

cats_05.Description: Slapped, punched, or beat up by someone not in your family.

cats_07.Description: Seeing someone in the community get slapped, punched.

cats_10.Description: Someone close to you dying suddenly or violently.

cats_11.Description: Attacked, stabbed, shot at or hurt badly.

cats_12.Description: Seeing someone attacked, stabbed, shot at, hurt badly or killed.

cats_total_score.Description: Global score comprised of the sum of all items
